title: Book Text-to-Speech Metadata
description: Describes how to convert a set of text files into an audiobook

voice.description: The identifier of the Azure voice to use

maxPartCharacters.description: The maximum size, in text characters, of an individual MP3 file

prosodyRate.description: A positive or negative number representing the % by which the speech speed should be increased or decreased compared to the default

pitch.description: A positive or negative number representing the % by which the speech pitch should be raised or lowered compared to the default

metadata.description: Metadata to include in the MP3 tags for this audiobook

author.description: The name of the author of this book

publishedYear.description: The year in which this book was published

coverImage.description: A relative path to an image file representing the cover of this book

files.description: Settings describing how to find the text files used as the source text for this book

ignoreFiles.description: A list of relative paths to text files which should be excluded when generating audio
